title: Gamers Are Fierce
author: Complete darkness
description: Many strange phenomena have been happening in Yin City. Li Ang‚Äîwhose alias is Li Risheng‚Äîbecomes embroiled in an absolute real game of life-and-death, known as Killing Field.Using his above average analytical and deductive skills, he completes different quests assigned by the system, such as eliminating supernatural beings or solving cases, while trying to unravel the true nature of the game.

title: All The Female Disciples Want To Kill Me
author: Hateful Ears Chant Crimes
description: Su Bei sat on No-Sword Peak, contentedly watching his female disciple scurry about.That would have completed his first task for his System Quest assigned by ‚ÄúThe Highest Ten Thousand Fold Feedback for Discipleship‚Äù system!Xia Ruoching looked at Su Bei with a serious face,‚ÄúMaster, this is the spiritual fruit I got from the Sect Leader. He said it'd be helpful for your injuries!‚ÄùSu Bei gazed at the half-black, half-red fruit in front of him and fell into deep thought.‚ÄúAre you sure this is what the fruit looks like?‚Äù‚Äú......‚Äù‚ÄúThis is the real deal, Master! That half is definitely not poisoned! Eating this spiritual fruit would be such a wonderful experience, ah!‚Äù‚Äú?‚Äù‚Äú......‚ÄùYears later.Su Bei, while leading one of his many disciples back to Sword Sect, suddenly sneezed and muttered,‚ÄúThat's strange. Why do I keep feeling like a bunch of people are cursing me?‚ÄùThe eldest disciple looked at the new junior sisters with a stunned expression, ‚ÄúWhat? You want to kill Master too?‚Äù......The book is also known as ‚ÄúI Have the Highest Ten Thousand Fold Feedback System for Discipleship.‚Äù‚ÄúI Am a Transmigrator, Not the Su Bei You Know!‚Äù‚ÄúI Really Didn't Steal The Disciples' Talents, Okay!‚Äù‚ÄúAssassinations from the Reincarnated Disciples!‚Äù‚ÄúAssassinating Master‚Äù

title: Sage of Humanity
author: Momo
description: The weak cry out with all their might, yet no one cares; The strong whisper softly, yet their words penetrate deeply into the heart.A Talent Tree ablaze with flames, every leaf bearing different spirit runes, Lu Ye, reduced to a mining slave after his sect was destroyed, used this to become a cultivator and stirred the winds of change in the Nine Provinces...

title: Will of –°haos
author: Pendragon_DNT
description:
The Mc reincarnates in a world of magic and adventure as a Leech, follow his adventure in this... Read more 
The Mc reincarnates in a world of magic and adventure as a Leech, follow his adventure in this mysterious and exciting world as he goes from the weakest creature to the shadow being that everyone is afraid of. Will he pursue the path of strength alone? Or without realizing it he will become the king of the greatest empire that ever lived.***Author: This is my first story and English is not my native language, I am using Google translator to translate the story for me, I accept opinions and questions in the comments for this week's chapter.I intend to make this a long story so all the development of the Mc and the world will be slow for a proper construction, be warned.***I know the first few chapters have some errors, but I've improved my writing as I progressed through the story, after 10 chapters there won't be that many errors. Collapse 

Male Protagonist, Non-human Protagonist, Evolution, System, Weak to Strong, Reincarnation, Vampires, Kingdom Building

The story has potential, but it's becoming shit with all the slowness of the chapters, a lot of them seem like filler.other shit and the mc with drama all the time.MC is very mentally unstable, one moment he's cold, and says he doesn't feel anything when he kills, another he's like a little hero throwing a tantrum because he sees the suffering of random people.now crying because of a shack in the middle of the forest, when he is leaving.Damn, the MC has to be very unstable, now he cries because of a house he built

From what the author said, it's basically a mtl

I'm rating this novel ‚≠ê‚≠ê, only because my favorite kingdom building are so average no description on building town or city and her dungeon master are also average no improvement in the dungeon. What I see here are fighting in right and left and collecting subordinates or daughters. I'm still 450cht  But the story are so cool because MC have cool and kind characteristics / Skill tree and evolution line in vampire I Love all

When next chapter is coming??

it is good at the beginning but starts getting really repetitive as time goes on. it has so many chapters where its like i woke up said good morning trained talked fell asleep. it gets super annoying and boring

I'm having a hard time finding the rpg genre with harem

title: Top Actress Beware: Also Reborn Is Your CEO Husband!
author: Low-hanging clouds
description: Five years of marriage filled with love and devotion, she exhausted herself day and night for him, only to meet a tragic end unwillingly.Upon rebirth, she throws a divorce paper in front of him, ‚ÄúDivorce!‚Äù‚ÄúFine!‚Äù The man, enraged, slams the table and makes a call to the secretary.Five minutes later, Aurelia Shaw receives a message on her phone, ‚ÄúMason Nightshade, are you crazy! Why did you transfer all your assets to my name?!‚ÄùThe man pretends to be pitiful and loosens his tie, ‚ÄúWife, I'm now penniless, please take me in.‚ÄùDamn~! Can someone tell her why this guy seems like a completely different person after her rebirth!(This is a dual rebirth story. When the reincarnated female lead encounters the reincarnated male lead, the cold male turns into a warm loyal puppy. In the past life, you ignored my love; in this life, the male lead starts a long journey of tirelessly pursuing, loving, and pampering his wife with no limits.)

latest_chapter.title: Chapter 132: I won't give you such an opportunity

title: Can't Stand This Lousy Jie Sect Anymore
author: Durian rice wine
description: Yu Yuan is reincarnated before the Fengshen period and becomes a disciple under the Jin Ling Holy Mother of Jie Sect, and the senior brother of Wen Zhong.Seeing the great calamity approaching, a group of Jie Sect disciples are still immersed in the halo of being from a 'Sage's Great Sect,' recklessly risking their lives. Yu Yuan looks at the Fengshen List in his hand with a sigh: 'Can't stay in this lousy Jie Sect any longer...'Zhun Ti: 'The Jie Sect is indeed rotten, unworthy of a person of small friend's caliber. I wonder if you would like to come to my West?'Yu Yuan slapped him across the face, 'Jie Sect can only be scolded by me! Try saying another word!'

latest_chapter.title: Chapter 499 - 426: Someone Really Came Looking for Death (Please Subscribe)_2

title: What is an immortal?
author: Wang Yu
description: He cradled an incense burner in his hand and lit thirty minutes of incense. Wisps of blue smoke swirled around, and in that instant, his Divine Thought pierced heaven and earth, all worldly fetters dissolved into nothingness.Such was the Immortal.

title: Naruto: Copy System
author: Dragoniax
description:
Reborn in the Naruto world, Shin Uzumaki finds himself in the doomed Land of Whirlpools. As a member of the Uzumaki Clan! Trapped in a world filled with war, betrayal, and unimaginable power, Shin‚Äôs survival seems impossible.. Until it isn‚Äôt!![Ding! Replication System Activated!]
[Daily Login Reward: Common Replication Card.]
[Newbie Gift: Perfect Sage Body‚ÄîAdamantine Sealing Chains‚ÄîFour Symbols Seal]With the power to Copy any Ability‚Äîwhether it‚Äôs the Kekkei Genkai or Rinnegan or Forbidden jutsu‚ÄîShin begins his journey to dominate the Ninja World. [First task: Save Kushina and prevent the destruction of the Uzumaki Clan.]
